description: Bitten by a radioactive spider, Peter Parker gained superhuman strength, agility and can crawl on walls. Peter works as Doctor Akatsuki`s assistant in developing the DISKs when their lab is under attack by the Crimson Dynamo as part of Loki`s plot. After being punched out of the building, Peter dons his Spider-Man costume and returns to aid Doctor Akatsuki and his sons.
name: Spider-Man
